channel.title: Adding Dungeoneering Emote PI - Erasedpkz Compatable! HELP ME
channel.description:
[size=12pt][shadow=red,left][center][b]hey guys what's up? im n need of the GFX and anims for Dungeoneering emote. basicly i need the codes to make the cape perform the emote! my cache loads everything! has the cape but no emote, can anyone help me out? ill rep++!! [img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20100526182933/runescape/images/archive/2/28/20110530030841!Dungeoneering_Melee_Emote.gif[/img] Fish
also if you guys like me post differently like this format rather then boring old version others do then just post a comment if u like it or not :)[/b][/center][/shadow][/size]

item.title: Adding Dungeoneering Emote PI - Erasedpkz Compatable! HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

It will work,

The first formula changes the Character into the NPC. (The NPC representing the Melee, Ranged, and Magic.). When someone does the Dungeoneering emote, they are currently transforming into NPC’s.

The Second formula is what activates the animation. (The player disappeared into the ground for a second and comes back up, Into another NPC, (the first formula).

I put mine in my emote tab.java but I dunno how 317’s work. I figured you would know that part lol, I never touched a 317 so I doubt I know even half the files that are in there :p. Sorry bro :/.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Dungeoneering Emote PI - Erasedpkz Compatable! HELP ME
item.dc:creator: @Nasz Nasz
item.description:
@Nasz wrote:

1 min ill edit this post when I get it, I put it in my source file somewhere for the emote i have.

EDIT Kk, I’ll just copy and paste mine =d.

If wrong, reply I’ll keep going lolz.

[code]if(buttonId == 39){
doskillcapeEmote§;
if(p.getEquipment().getSlot(1) == 15706 || p.getEquipment().getSlot(1) == 18508 || p.getEquipment().getSlot(1) == 18509 || p.getEquipment().getSlot(1) == 19709 || p.getEquipment().getSlot(1) == 19710){
p.animate(Animation.create(13190));
p.graphics(Graphics.create(2442));
final int rand = (int) (Math.random() * (2 + 1));
World.getWorld().submit(new Tickable(2){

				public void execute(){
					p.getAppearence().setNpcType((short) (rand==0?11227:(rand==1?11228:11229)));
					p.getMask().setApperanceUpdate(true);
					p.animate(Animation.create(rand==0?13192:(rand==1?13193:13194)));
					this.stop();
				}
			});
			World.getWorld().submit(new Tickable(7){
				
				public void execute(){
					p.getAppearence().setNpcType((short) -1);
					p.getMask().setApperanceUpdate(true);
					this.stop();
				}
			});
			
		}
	}[/code]
